articles.title: Zelenskyy to meet Trump on Monday after Putin summit briefing
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced he will travel to Washington on Monday to meet with U.S. President Donald Trump. The meeting follows a phone call where Trump briefed Zelenskyy on his summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska. While the Alaska summit did not result in a ceasefire agreement for the ongoing war in Ukraine, Trump has proposed a trilateral meeting between the three leaders.

articles.title: Hurricane Erin explodes in strength to a Category 5 storm in the Caribbean
articles.description: Hurricane Erin has rapidly intensified into a Category 5 storm in the Caribbean, with maximum sustained winds reaching 160 mph. While the hurricane's center is currently forecast to remain offshore, it is expected to bring heavy rains and the risk of flash flooding and landslides to nearby islands, including Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.

articles.title: Flooding kills over 300 people in Pakistan, India
articles.description: Severe flash floods and landslides triggered by heavy monsoon rains have resulted in the deaths of over 300 people across Pakistan and India. Rescue operations are underway as authorities search for many who are still missing. A helicopter involved in the relief efforts in Pakistan crashed due to bad weather, killing five people on board.
